column2: Bribed Bureaucrat
Bureaucrats can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Influenced Politician
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a politician, his underlings and connections has come under your sway.
Controlled City Hall
City hall has come under your control.
Ghouled Mayor
You have ghouled the Mayor of the city.
Conditioned Civilian Administration
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the staff and members of the city administration.
Bribed Student
Students can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Influenced Professor
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a major professor, his students and his influence on ideas has come under your control.
Controlled University
A major university in the city has come under your control.
Ghouled Dean
You have ghouled the dean of a city university.
Conditioned Student Body
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the staff and members of a city university.
Bribed Orderly
Orderlies can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Influenced Nurse
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a nurse, his orderlies and his access to the hospital has come under your control.
Controlled Hospital
A major hospital in the city has come under your control.
Ghouled Doctor
You have ghouled an important doctor of a city hospital.
Conditioned Hospital Staff
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the staff and members of a city hospital.
Bribed Orphan
Orphans can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Influenced Bully
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a bully, his gang and his criminal activities has come under your control.
Controlled Orphanage
A major orphanage in the city has come under your control.
Ghouled Matron
You have ghouled the matron of a city orphanage.
Conditioned Orphans
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the orphans of a city orphanage.
Bribed Prisoner
Prisoners can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Influenced Guard
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a guard, his underlings and his access to the prison has come under your control.
Controlled Prison
A major prison in the city has come under your control.
Ghouled Warden
You have ghouled the warden of a city prison.
Conditioned Prison Gang
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the members of a city prison gang.
Bribed Apprentice
Apprentices can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Influenced Journeyman
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: an important journeyman, his underlings and his access to the guilds has come under your control.
Controlled Guilds
The Guild Ward in the city has come under your control.
Ghouled Guild Master
You have ghouled a guild master of a guild in the city.
Conditioned Guild Members
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the staff and members of a city guild.
Bribed Beggar
Beggars can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Influenced Landlord
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a major landlord, his underlings and his holdings in the slums has come under your control.
Controlled Slum
A major slum in the city has come under your control.
Ghouled Slumlord
You have ghouled the Slumlord of a city slum.
Conditioned Slumlord Gang
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the members of a Slumlord's gang.
Bribed Drover
Drovers can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...
Influenced Meat Cutter
Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: a meat cutter, his underlings and his access to the abattoir ward has come under your control.
Controlled Abattoir Ward
An Abattoir Ward in the city has come under your control.
Ghouled Butcher
You have ghouled a prominent butcher of the city.
Conditioned Butcher's Guild
You have used your discipline of domination to condition all the members of the butcher's guild.
Bribed Inmate
Inmates can be paid for other services: information, minor crimes, blood, etc...

Through a combination of money, blackmail and supernatural abilities: an orderly, his underlings and his access to the asylum has come under your control.

Papillion Ward
The Rack.  Fertile hunting ground in the city.
